doc.title: With Honors Denied
doc.plot: Japanese bombs hit Pearl Harbor on a Sunday. Monday marked the start of a young girl's war. Yukiko Kubo Shiogi, an American betrayed by America, endured her family's imprisonment during the darkest days of World War II. She lost her freedom and a cherished right of passage, but she never lost faith in her nation or herself. "With Honors Denied" follows Yuki's 60-year journey from persecution to redemption, and weaves a heartwarming, true-life tale of a broken promise, a lifelong regret, and a dream finally fulfilled.
